com.bambora

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bambora.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    An API client for accessing the payment gateway for session initiation request and payment URL retrieval.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Client(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String dL, EndPoint endPoint)
      Client Constructor for creating a Client instance.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getPaymentFormUrl(java.lang.String sessionID, java.lang.String secureSessionToken)
      Get the service payment form URL for inclusion in client such as iFrame.
      java.lang.String getSessionToken(SessionInitiationRequestObject requestObject)
      Initiate a service session and get a session token for use in subsequent requests.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(java.lang.String userName,
              java.lang.String password,
              java.lang.String dL,
              EndPoint endPoint)
       throws ClientException
        Client Constructor for creating a Client instance.
        Parameters:
        userName - the API username supplied by IPP
        password - the API password supplied by IPP
        dL - the value specifies the styling and functionality. It is supplied by Bambora
        endPoint - the IPP service endpoint
        Throws:
        ClientException

    • Method Detail

      • getSessionToken

        public java.lang.String getSessionToken(SessionInitiationRequestObject requestObject)
                                 throws ClientException
        Initiate a service session and get a session token for use in subsequent requests.
        Parameters:
        requestObject - a session initiation object
        Returns:
        a session token for use in subsequent requests
        Throws:
        ClientException - on failure

      • getPaymentFormUrl

        public java.lang.String getPaymentFormUrl(java.lang.String sessionID,
                                          java.lang.String secureSessionToken)
        Get the service payment form URL for inclusion in client such as iFrame. The sessionID and secureSessionToken is one-use only so subsequent request will result in error.
        Parameters:
        sessionID - your identifier of a user session
        secureSessionToken - a token previously return by IP Payments
        Returns:
        The payment form URL
